    • Method Detail

      • getOrders

        @RequestMapping(path="/get/all",
                produces={"application/json","application/xml"},
                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
public EntityList<Order> getOrders()
        Function to enable to retrieve all orders.

        It's a Web-Service is accessible via 'localhost:8080/api/order/get/all'.

        Return two formats :
        XML - By default - Add to the request header : 'Accept':'application/xml'
        JSON - Add to the request header : 'Accept':'application/json'

        Returns:
        List - All Orders

      • getOrdersById

        @RequestMapping(path="/get/{orderId}",
                produces={"application/json","application/xml"},
                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
public Order getOrdersById(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                              int orderId)
        Function to enable to retrieve one order by its id.

        It's a Web-Service is accessible via 'localhost:8080/api/order/get/{orderId}'

        Example : localhost:8080/api/order/get/1

        Return two formats :
        XML - By default - Add to the request header : 'Accept':'application/xml'
        JSON - Add to the request header : 'Accept':'application/json'

        Parameters:
        orderId - - Order Id that will be retrieved
        Returns:
        Order

      • save

        @RequestMapping(path="/create",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseBody
public Order save(@RequestBody
                                                                                              Order order)
        Function to enable to create a new Order

        It's a Web-Service is accessible via 'localhost:8080/api/order/create'

        Request, two formats :
        XML - Add to the request header : 'Accept':'application/xml' and the new Order.
        JSON - Add to the request header : 'Accept':'application/json' and the new Order.

        Example Request Body :
        JSON : { "dateGreated": "2016-06-27T22:00:00+0000" }
        XML : <order> <dateGreated>2016-06-28T00:00:00+02:00 </dateGreated> </order>"

        Parameters:
        order - - Order that will be give to the request body
        Returns:
        Order - The new Order
